title: @Riot, can you do the rewards for Ocean Week BEFORE Jhin comes out?
body: Otherwise the people with all Champions aren't going to get a Mystery Skin, they'll get Jhin if they didn't immediately purchase him or if you release Jhin on the same day that you distribute Ocean Week rewards.

replies.body:
Hey man,

You aren't eligible to get a Mystery Champion if you don't have 10 unowned champions. So if you have less than 10 unowned champions you should be receiving a mystery skin.
Thank you for that clarification. It would be a real bummer if a cool freebie was wasted on one of the few IP sinks in this game.
the rewards are going to get rewarded next patch...
if you read the rewards says rewarded after the event if unlocked the event ends 11.00ast
Yeah, it says it's being released 'at a later day during **_this_** patch cycle.'.

This is a fair point, I'll be pretty mad if I miss the chance of spending some IP
I can't give the stuff away...

Literally
